column1: Make sure to ALWAYS buy laser goggles from a reputable brand and with properly rated specifications. The links I listed are not necessarily what you should buy
column2: always consult an eye doctor for proper advice. Lasers are extremely dangerous and you should never look at them directly and always wear proper safety goggles. I am not responsible for any damage caused from irresponsibly using lasers.
